title: Sausage and Lentil Soup
ingredients: ['60g uncooked white rice', '150ml water', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '115g turkey kielbasa, chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies', '1.5 litres water', '475ml low salt chicken stock', '190g dry lentils', '285g fresh spinach, torn']
